# aci_fibre_channel_interface_policy #

Data source for ACI Fibre Channel Interface Policy

## API Information ##

* Class: [fcIfPol](https://pubhub.devnetcloud.com/media/model-doc-latest/docs/app/index.html#/objects/fcIfPol/overview)

* Supported in ACI versions: 2.0(1m) and later.

* Distinguished Name Format: `uni/infra/fcIfPol-{name}`

## GUI Information ##

* Location: `Fabric -> Access Policies -> Policies -> Interface -> Fibre Channel Interface`

## Example Usage ##

```hcl

data "aci_fibre_channel_interface_policy" "example" {
  name = "test_name"
}

```

## Schema ##

### Required ###

* `name` (name) - (string) The name of the Fibre Channel Interface Policy object.

### Read-Only ###

* `id` - (string) The distinguished name (DN) of the Fibre Channel Interface Policy object.
* `annotation` (annotation) - (string) The annotation of the Fibre Channel Interface Policy object. This attribute is supported in ACI versions: 3.2(1l) and later.
* `auto_max_speed` (automaxspeed) - (string) The maximum speed for the Fibre Channel Interface Policy object when set to auto negotiation. This attribute is supported in ACI versions: 4.1(1i) and later.
* `description` (descr) - (string) The description of the Fibre Channel Interface Policy object.
* `fill_pattern` (fillPattern) - (string) The fill pattern for the Fibre Channel Interface Policy object. This attribute is only applicable for native fibre channel ports. This attribute is supported in ACI versions: 3.2(1l) and later.
* `name_alias` (nameAlias) - (string) The name alias of the Fibre Channel Interface Policy object. This attribute is supported in ACI versions: 2.2(1k) and later.
* `owner_key` (ownerKey) - (string) The key for enabling clients to own their data for entity correlation.
* `owner_tag` (ownerTag) - (string) A tag for enabling clients to add their own data. For example, to indicate who created this object.
* `port_mode` (portMode) - (string) The port mode for the Fibre Channel Interface Policy object.
* `receive_buffer_credit` (rxBBCredit) - (string) The receive buffer credit amount for the Fibre Channel Interface Policy object. This attribute is only applicable for native fibre channel ports. The value must be in the range 16 - 64. This attribute is supported in ACI versions: 3.2(1l) and later.
* `speed` (speed) - (string) The speed for the Fibre Channel Interface Policy object. This attribute is only applicable for native fibre channel ports. This attribute is supported in ACI versions: 3.2(1l) and later.
* `trunk_mode` (trunkMode) - (string) The trunk mode for the Fibre Channel Interface Policy object. This attribute is only applicable for native fibre channel ports. This attribute is supported in ACI versions: 3.2(1l) and later.
* `annotations` - (list) A list of Annotations (ACI object [tagAnnotation](https://pubhub.devnetcloud.com/media/model-doc-latest/docs/app/index.html#/objects/tagAnnotation/overview)). This attribute is supported in ACI versions: 3.2(1l) and later.
    * `key` (key) - (string) The key used to uniquely identify this configuration object.
    * `value` (value) - (string) The value of the property.
* `tags` - (list) A list of Tags (ACI object [tagTag](https://pubhub.devnetcloud.com/media/model-doc-latest/docs/app/index.html#/objects/tagTag/overview)). This attribute is supported in ACI versions: 3.2(1l) and later.
    * `key` (key) - (string) The key used to uniquely identify this configuration object.
    * `value` (value) - (string) The value of the property.
